name: Jinzo (Demo Day XIII ver.)
description:
Released for /agdg/ Demo Day XIII. This is a prototype: not a finished game. I am developing it in my spare time so it will probably take a while.

(/・ω・)/ I changed the title! Formerly Super Space Jam Jetpack Robot Turbo or something like that.

As always its a mess that I scrapped together in the last hours. I hope you can enjoy this somehow.

Highlights since the last prototype:

  • Different levels!
  • New enemies!
  • Big changes to shooting controls and animations!

Controls:

  • Arrow keys - Walk/Fly
  • Z - Shoot
  • Spacebar - Interact
  • Shift - Slow
